Net Income: income loss from equity method investments

Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax period increase decrease
other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to parent

Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital other

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value acquisitions
Stock-Based Compensation: stock issued during period value employee stock and cash incentive plan
stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: treasury stock value acquired cost method
__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share cash paid
incremental common shares attributable to other stock compensation plans
incremental common shares attributable to restricted stock units
incremental common shares attributable to stock option and stock appreciation right plans

stock issued during period shares share based compensation
